title: Moving up
content:
Pretty much by accident I read about
[url=http://www.yuku.com/]Yuku[/url] in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuku]this[/url] Wikipedia article.

Apparently ezboards are going to be upgraded to Yuku boards.
Unless the PCKF is moved somewhere after all, I suppose this one will be upgraded as well.
I checked one of the beta boards, and it doesn't seem to be very different from ezboard, but I have to admit it was only a very casual look.
I just hope the developers will fix/enhance things like the Search feature as well, not just add new features while leaving the old annoyances present now.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: bah
content: So we've got topics moving Up, Out, Back and On, now? You've a cruel sense of humor, Ret. I'm curious how long the transition will take.

title: Re: bah
content:
We're movin' on uuuup. To tha' east siiiiiiiiide.
To a deeeluxe apartment in the skyyyyyyyy.[center]TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS[/center]

title: Re: bah
content:
This sounds rather interesting.. Looks good to me. My only complaint in this board is the search feature, however..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: bah
content:
I was inspired by allstories, in the "Back" thread.
He mentioned "parody", and I hadn't a clue what he was talking about, until I noticed the thread list right after that.
So, it's not my humour, it's just borrowed. :P

And no, the Search feature isn't the only thing I think needs improvement either, but I just picked 1 thing.Retodon8

title: Re: bah
content:
Keen: Right! Everyone here?

KR: *pokes chair* Oooh! Cushy!

Rorie: All present and accounted fo- ZOMG! Twenty poll options!

Mort: Hmmm, seems a bit quiet, you sure we have *everyone*?

*Meanwhile...*

LL: Hello? HELLO? Where *is* everyone?

title: Re: bah
content:
BTW, Yuku is currently a horrible piece of crap - I know it's in beta, but it'll have to get a hell of a lot beta [PUN ALERT] before it's vaguely suitable for public consumption. Apparently, ezBoard has decided to try and float up on the blog-forum-image-gallery-social-networking-kitchen-sink bubble in their new incarnation: tags, RSS feeds, Ajax and all. Additionally, it's way harder to use, more ugly and generally much more irritating. I hope that we get out of this frying pan that is ezBoard before we're thrown into the roaring, Javascripted, Myspace-clone fire that is Yuku. Ugh.

On the plus side, Yuku forums have a much nicer URL layout [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [url=http://toxicsheep.com]toxicsheep.com[/url] | [url=http://commanderkeen.org]coming up next...[/url]

content:

content: It's a complicated mixture of politics, breakdown of communications between Chogall and the other admins and apathy. This is the impression I got, anyway, so I'm probably way off.

title: Re: bah
content: That's...pretty much it grafix.  I could move this board anytime, but it's chogall's board and he claims that he's setting up server for the new board and CC314.  I haven't spoken to him in ages though, the only way I know he's still around is that he periodically pays for more time at ezBoard.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]
